name: A Most Ghostly Game - Full version
name_original: A Most Ghostly Game - Full version
description:
Originally made for the 2020GMTK Game Jam.

All these lost souls ensnared in our game. Don't they know it's pointless?

They believe that there's hope of reaching the end.

They will be severely disappointed by the only ending they find.

Launch out of bubbles and use it's gravity to bounce between enemies. You only have full control inside the bubbles, but if you want the highest score you'll need to bounce off enemies for as long as possible to maintain your combo.
